The claim involves a fictional story abo: S. Supreme Court for the arrest of one of Barack Obama's treasury secretaries.
The person named in the claim: Donald M. Allard, has never been the secretary of the Treasury Department. The two secretaries who served under Obama were Timothy Geithner and Jacob Lew.
The U: S. Supreme Court currently has 50 cases on the docket for the term that began in October, and none of them directly concerns the Treasury Department.
The websites that published the story: Freedum Junkshun and America's Last Line of Defense, describe their work as satirical fiction, but other websites have republished the stories without any disclaimer.
